question: Which organization was formed in Germany in 1914 during World War I by Indian students and political activists residing in the country?
explanation: The Indian Independence Committee also known as Berlin Committee was formed in Germany in 1914 during the time of World War I. It was formed by Indian students and political activists of Germany. Its main objective was to promote the cause of Indian Independence. Virendranath Chattopadhyaya, Chempakaraman Pillai and Abinash Bhattacharya were some notable members of the committee.
